nodes.text: Liam Byrne was a Human male and an Imperial Commander during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Around 1 ABY, he was posted to Yavin 4 as part of a team investigating the abandoned Rebel base there. He did not like the climate there and hired a spacer to help him with a number of tasks.
Liam Byrne, identified as Cmdr. Liam Byrne in the game, was a non-player character (NPC) in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies.
